runs.comm: out first ball! Khadka starts around the wicket and this one pitches on a good length on middle and then bounces. Ahmed propped his bat out at an angle and has feathered it through. It had gone on with the arm and the batsman was caught out fishing for it
tossed up just outside off and he drives into the covers
flighted on middle and leg, he comes forward to block into the leg side
hint of room outside off and Atkinson drives into the gap at cover. Doesn't hit it too hard, just a little tap
flighted on middle and off, he comes forward to block
flatter ball on leg stump, he goes for the sweep and the ball lobs off his pads past the keeper's reach
back of a length, ducks into him as Atkinson works towards midwicket. Soft hands ensures it is far enough from the fielder for a single
good length ball on off stump, stays back and blocks
hint of away swing and that beats the Barkat's lazy swing. No feet there.
back of a length on middle and leg, quick single before the bowler can rush across from his followthrough
width outside off and he has creamed this over cover. The bottom hand comes off the bat but he has put enough muscle into it

chopped on! Kami unleashes a back of a length skidder just outside off and Atkinson was going for that cut shot again. This time he gets a inside edge onto the stumps and the bowler sends him off as well. Nepal are absolutely thrilled!
no room given by Khadka from the round the wicket line, the batsman punches it to midwicket
wow! Barkat chips down the pitch and drives this handsomely through covers, exquisite timing.
goes on the back foot and nudges the flatter delivery to square leg for an easy single
he waits on the back foot, but he has no room to manoeuvre, pushes it back to the bowler
slides it across the right hander, who goes for the cut, but is beaten by the bounce
slower and flighted on off, the batsman comes forward to push it back to the bowler
this one is punched down the ground and was trickling at gentle pace, but the fielder, running in from mid-on, puts out a slide and ends up pushing this to the boundary
he dabs it to cover and thinks of a single, but is rightly sent back in time
he is nippy with his pace, Kami. He is keeping it above 130s and in good areas. The batsman defends this length ball to cover again
he pushes it to point and looks for a single, but goes back as he sees the fielder charging in. However, the throw is not backed up and gives an extra run
quick short of length delivery without any room, the batsman can only dab it back down the pitch
another good delivery, a touch outside off, the batsman opens the face to run it down to third man
nice compact action, he bowls it on length on off stump, the batsman punches it to midwicket
Almost a wicket! Hayat wanted to flat bat this down the ground, but he gets a thick top edge that lobs over the mid-off fielder, who runs back but cannot reach the ball
no half-measures on this one, it's right off the meat! Mukhiya doesn't have the pace to rattle anyone and Hayat just stands tall and slaps it to deep midwicket boundary with disdain
he is picked his region, wide of mid-on! This one was outside off, not bouncing high enough, and Hayat slogs it over wide mid-on for another boundary. The innings is on the move
short ball wide outside off, doesn't bounce that much. The batsman punches it to the off side but cannot beat the man at cover point
slightly slower this time from Mukhiya and it messes the batsman's timing as he looks to steer it to third man. He ends up dabbing it towards point
and he is greeted with a wonderful inside out drive over extra cover! That has been a popular shot all day, beautifully executed
tossed up on the pads, the batsman comes forward and drives to midwicket
slightly shorter this time, the batsman gives himself room to cut it behind point, but is not able to beat the fielder
slower this time and on the pads, the batsman fails to get any bat on it as he looks to nudge it away
he comes down the pitch and punches the flighted delivery to long off for a single
slow and tossed up, it beats the batsman's attempt to flick it fine and he gets hit on the pads, but that was always heading down
starts off with a low trajectory flatter delivery from round the stumps, the batsman defends it to off
flatter again and on a length, keeps coming in with the angle and the batsman dabs it to cover for a quick single
slower and wide outside off, the batsman drags it from there with a mow to deep midwicket

a wicket for Shakti in his first over! The batsman charged down the pitch and looked to chip it over long off, but he was too early into the shot - his bottom hand coming off the handle too - and only manages to hit it straight to the long off fielder
this stays low outside off and the batsman is lucky that the inside edge hits his pads
flat and slow on the stumps, the batsman pushes it softly towards mid-on for a single
bowls it quicker on the pads and is flicked to deep square leg for a single
tossed up on off stump, the batsman comes forward and punches it down the ground to long on for a single
very slow and the batsman has all the time to wait for it, then whip it to deep midwicket
looped up, but it's not full enough. The slowness of pace allows the batsman to get back and punch it powerfully to wide long off for a couple
looks to cut as there is some room this time, but gets beaten
too slow again, the batsman waits and opens the face late to run it down fine on the off side
pushed through on off stump, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
flatter and quicker, the batsman goes back and cuts it hard, but it's hit straight to point
he goes on the back foot and punches it down to long on for a single
that bounced a touch extra and surprised the batsman, who took his bottom hand off as he defended that
tries to paddle it fine on the leg side, but is not able to beat the short fine leg fielder
comes down the track but is not to the pitch of the delivery, pushes it straight to cover
quicker delivery on off stump, the batsman squirts it through cover point for a single
tossed up delivery for the first time and it's an invitation for the batsman to go over the top, but he is not able to beat the fielder at deep extra cover, who runs around and cuts out the boundary
fuller and quicker, Hayat almost yorks himself as he comes out of the crease, pushes it to long on
he makes room and chips the length delivery to the long off fielder
he tries to swing across the line, but gets hit on the pads, outside the line of leg stump
this is a smartly taken second! The batsman pushes it softly towards long on and scampers back, taking the fielder by surprise
only a little bit of width and Chapman latches on to it, cutting it through backward point to start the over with a boundary
tossed up delivery, the batsman goes down on his knee to paddle it fine, but he gets a top edge over the keeper's head for a couple

Timber!! that has gone through! The batsman is beaten in the flight! He was looking for that cut short again, but it was much straighter and much fuller than the first delivery. Chapman misses and it hits the middle of the middle stump. Hong Kong sink further

Take that! Second time he takes the middle stump out! Super bowling this by Regmi, tossed up, goes straight on and the batsman, looking to play across the line, misses the line of the ball. The middle stump is uprooted. Nepal are on a roll here...
good ball to the new batsman! tossed up, in line of stumps, the batsman does well to defend that
pushed through outside off, the batsman goes back and punches it to point

they keep coming! Now Shakti hits the top of off! Shakti has been bowling these low trajectory skidders just short of length. This time, Hayat, went back to push it through off and missed it completely. He looked around to check with the umpire if that was the ball hitting the stump or the keeper, but surely it was the ball that kissed the top..
slower and on off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends it to midwicket
he pushes this one through on off stump, the batsman punches it back to the bowler

the stumps are taking a battering! Hong Kong are having trouble keeping these low skidders out! It's bowled from wide of the crease, it keeps coming in with the angle and the batsman, looking for the cut, chops it on to his leg stump..Shakti goes for a celebratory sprint..He is unstoppable
flatter and slower on off, the batsman comes forward to defend it to off
short and the batsman goes back to cut, but gets a thick outside edge that takes Hong Kong past the booby trap of 58
he stays in the crease and defends the loopy delivery to the leg side
loud appeal for lbw but there was a huge inside edge on that one.. The batsman needs to be careful as he is playing on the back foot
the procession continues! The batsman sees width, throws bat, hits it straight to point. Numero Tres for Regmi
full and flighted, the batsman comes forward and drives it to deep cover for a single
tossed up delivery on the pads, the batsman misses the flick, it lobs up after hitting the pads for the keeper to grab it.. No one appeals
he brings down the bat belatedly to keep this pushed through delivery out
it is short of length outside off, the batsman steers it to third man for a single
targets the stumps with a skiddy delivery, the batsman comes forward and defends
stays on the back foot and defends the length delivery to cover
short ball, too short and wide outside off too. Aleem Dar thinks it's fine and the bowler gets away with it
that extra bounce again! It takes off from a length, but the batsman manages to defend it to midwicket

'no. 9, he is all mine,' Kami might say.. Amar defended a few but he had to throw the bat at some stage, he decided now was the time.. It's a length ball outside off, expectedly bounces extra, the batsman goes for a booming back foot drive and gets a thick outside edge to the keeper
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
flighted and it turns a bit, the batsman pushes it to cover for a single
tossed up delivery on the stumps, the batsman comes forward and defends it down the pitch
good bit of flight on off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover for a single
flighted delivery outside off, the batsman defends it to cover
comes down the pitch and punches it to long off for a single. That's the end of Regmi's wonderful spell
bowls it quicker outside off, the batsman manages to squeeze it past backward point for a single
oye that looked close! This one came in after pitching, but probably missing leg
flatter and on a length, the batsman punches it back to Shakti
fuller and outside off, the batsman stretches forward and pushes it through cover for a single
tossed up this time, the batsman covers the line nicely and defends
full and flighted on off, the batsman drives it straight to cover
bowls it full outside off, the batsman looks to drive but gets it on the inside half of the bat, pushes it back to the bowler
it's a good yorker on off, the batsman digs it out to long off
another good yorker from Mukhiya, not much the batsman can do. He blocks it out towards cover and takes a single
short ball now, the batsman looks for a pull, but is a touch late on it and gets beaten
another short delivery, this one bounces extra and whizzes past the helmet as the batsman swings his bat about
end of the innings! It's a beautiful yorker and the batsman threw his bat around, misses and loses the off stump..Massive win for Nepal here
